enum.name: ButtonName
enum.description: Defines the hard (physical) and soft (touchscreen) buttons available from SYNC

element.name: BUTTONUP
element.description: A button has been released up

element.name: BUTTONDOWN
element.description: A button has been pressed down

element.name: LONG
element.description: A button was released, after it was pressed for a long time. Actual timing is defined by Sync and may vary

element.name: SHORT
element.description: A button was released, after it was pressed for a short time. Actual timing is defined by Sync and may vary

enum.name: SoftButtonType
enum.description: Contains information about the SoftButton capabilities.

enum.name: SystemAction
enum.description: Enumeration that describes system actions that can be triggered.

element.name: DEFAULT_ACTION
element.description: Default action occurs. Standard behavior (e.g. SoftButton clears overlay).

element.name: KEEP_CONTEXT
element.description: Current system context is maintained. An overlay is persisted even though a SoftButton has been pressed and the notification sent.

enum.name: AppType
enum.description: Enumeration listing possible app types.

enum.name: DeactivateReason
enum.description: Enum of reasons of user navigating from application used by HMI.

element.name: GENERAL
element.description: Other screens navigation apart from other mobile app.

enum.name: UpdateMode
enum.description: Describes how the media clock timer should behave on the platform
Starts the media clock timer counting upwards, as in time elapsed.
Starts the media clock timer counting downwards, as in time remaining.
Pauses the media clock timer
Resume the media clock timer
Clears the media clock timer (previously done through Show->mediaClock)

enum.name: SystemContext
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible contexts an app's HMI might be in.
Communicated to whichever app is in HMI FULL, except Alert.

element.name: MAIN
element.description: The app's persistent display (whether media/non-media/navigation) is fully visible onscreen.

element.name: VRSESSION
element.description: The system is currently in a VR session (with whatever dedicated VR screen being overlaid onscreen).

element.name: MENU
element.description: The system is currently displaying a system or in-App menu onscreen.

element.name: HMI_OBSCURED
element.description: The app's display HMI is currently being obscured by either a system or other app's overlay.

element.name: ALERT
element.description: Broadcast only to whichever app has an alert currently being displayed.

enum.name: HmiZoneCapabilities
enum.description: Contains information about the HMI zone capabilities.
For future use.

enum.name: TBTState
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible states of turn-by-turn client or AppLink app.

enum.name: VehicleDataEventStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of a vehicle data event; e.g. a seat belt event status.

enum.name: VehicleDataStatus
enum.description: Reflects the status of a binary vehicle data item.

enum.name: PRNDL
enum.description: The selected gear.

enum.name: ComponentVolumeStatus
enum.description: The volume status of a vehicle component.

enum.name: VehicleDataResultCode
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible result codes of a vehicle data entry request.

enum.name: ApplicationsCloseReason
enum.description: Describes reason for exiting application.

struct.name: ButtonCapabilities
struct.description: Contains information about a button's capabilities.

param.name: shortPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a short press. Whenever the button is pressed short, onButtonPressed(SHORT) will be invoked.

param.name: longPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a LONG press. Whenever the button is pressed long, onButtonPressed(LONG) will be invoked.

param.name: upDownAvailable
param.description: The button supports "button down" and "button up". Whenever the button is pressed, onButtonEvent(DOWN) will be invoked. Whenever the button is released, onButtonEvent(UP) will be invoked.

struct.name: PresetBankCapabilities
struct.description: Contains information about on-screen preset capabilities.

param.name: onScreenPresetsAvailable
param.description: Onscreen custom presets are available.

param.name: type
param.description: Describes, whether it is text, highlighted text, icon, or dynamic image. See softButtonType

param.name: text
param.description: Optional text to display (if defined as TEXT or BOTH)

param.name: image
param.description: Optional image struct for SoftButton (if defined as IMAGE or BOTH)

param.name: isHighlighted
param.description: True, if highlighted
False, if not highlighted

param.name: softButtonID
param.description: Value which is returned via OnButtonPress / OnButtonEvent

param.name: systemAction
param.description: Parameter indicating whether selecting a SoftButton shall call a specific system action. This is intended to allow Notifications to bring the callee into full / focus; or in the case of persistent overlays, the overlay can persist when a SoftButton is pressed.

param.name: path
param.description: Either the static hex icon value or the binary image file name identifier (sent by PutFile).

struct.name: TTSChunk
struct.description: A TTS chunk, that consists of the text/phonemes to speak

param.name: text
param.description: The text or phonemes to speak.

struct.name: HMIApplication
struct.description: Data type containing information about application needed by HMI.

param.name: appName
param.description: The mobile application name, e.g. "Ford Drive Green".

param.name: ngnMediaScreenAppName
param.description: Provides an abbreviated version of the app name (if needed), that will be displayed on the NGN media screen.
If not provided, the appName is used instead (and will be truncated if too long)

param.name: icon
param.description: Path to application icon.

param.name: deviceName
param.description: Name of device on which provided application is running.

param.name: appId
param.description: Unique(during ignition cycle) id of application. To be used in all commands sent by application for identification.

param.name: hmiDisplayLanguageDesired
param.description: Current app’s expected display language

param.name: isMediaApplication
param.description: Indicates if the application is a media or a non-media application.
Only media applications will be able to stream audio to Sync that is audible outside of the BT media source.

param.name: appType
param.description: List of all applicable app types stating which classifications to be given to the app.
e.g. for platforms like GEN2, this will determine which "corner(s)" the app can populate.

param.name: parentID
param.description: unique ID of the sub menu, the command will be added to.
If not provided, it will be provided to the top level of the in application menu.

param.name: position
param.description: Position within the items that are are at top level of the in application menu.
0 will insert at the front.
1 will insert at the second position.
if position is greater or equal than the number of items on top level, the sub menu will be appended to the end.
If this param was omitted the entry will be added at the end.

param.name: menuName
param.description: Text to show in the menu for this sub menu.

struct.name: Choice
struct.description: A choice is an option given to the user which can be selected either by menu, or through voice recognition system.

param.name: text
param.description: Text to display for VR Help item

param.name: image
param.description: Image struct for VR Help item

param.name: position
param.description: Position to display item in VR Help list

param.name: hours
param.description: The hour of the media clock.
Some radios only support a max of 19 hours. If out of range, it will be rejected.

struct.name: DisplayCapabilities
struct.description: Contains information about the display capabilities.

param.name: displayType
param.description: The type of the display. See DisplayType

param.name: textFields
param.description: A set of all fields that support text data. See TextField

param.name: mediaClockFormats
param.description: A set of all supported formats of the media clock. See MediaClockFormat

struct.name: SoftButtonCapabilities
struct.description: Contains information about a SoftButton's capabilities.

param.name: shortPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a short press.
Whenever the button is pressed short, onButtonPressed( SHORT) will be invoked.

param.name: longPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a LONG press.
Whenever the button is pressed long, onButtonPressed( LONG) will be invoked.

param.name: upDownAvailable
param.description: The button supports "button down" and "button up".
Whenever the button is pressed, onButtonEvent( DOWN) will be invoked.
Whenever the button is released, onButtonEvent( UP) will be invoked.

param.name: imageSupported
param.description: The button supports referencing a static or dynamic image.

param.name: make
param.description: Make of the vehicle
e.g. Ford

param.name: model
param.description: Model of the vehicle
e.g. Fiesta

param.name: modelYear
param.description: Model Year of the vehicle

param.name: trim
param.description: Trim of the vehicle
e.g. SE

param.name: e911Override
param.description: Indicates whether e911 override is on. References signal "MyKey_e911Override_St". See VehicleDataStatus.

param.name: powerModeActive
param.description: References signal "PowerMode_UB".

param.name: powerModeQualificationStatus
param.description: References signal "PowerModeQF". See PowerModeQualificationStatus.

param.name: carModeStatus
param.description: References signal "CarMode". See CarMode.

param.name: powerModeStatus
param.description: References signal "PowerMode". See PowerMode.

param.name: emergencyEventType
param.description: References signal "VedsEvntType_D_Ltchd". See EmergencyEventType.

param.name: fuelCutoffStatus
param.description: References signal "RCM_FuelCutoff". See FuelCutoffStatus.

param.name: rolloverEvent
param.description: References signal "VedsEvntRoll_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: maximumChangeVelocity
param.description: References signal "VedsMaxDeltaV_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: multipleEvents
param.description: References signal "VedsMultiEvnt_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: driverAirbagDeployed
param.description: References signal "VedsDrvBag_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: driverSideAirbagDeployed
param.description: References signal "VedsDrvSideBag_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: driverCurtainAirbagDeployed
param.description: References signal "VedsDrvCrtnBag_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: passengerAirbagDeployed
param.description: References signal "VedsPasBag_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: passengerCurtainAirbagDeployed
param.description: References signal "VedsPasCrtnBag_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: driverKneeAirbagDeployed
param.description: References signal "VedsKneeDrvBag_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: passengerSideAirbagDeployed
param.description: References signal "VedsPasSideBag_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: passengerKneeAirbagDeployed
param.description: References signal "VedsKneePasBag_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: eCallNotificationStatus
param.description: References signal "eCallNotification_4A". See VehicleDataNotificationStatus.

param.name: auxECallNotificationStatus
param.description: References signal "eCallNotification". See VehicleDataNotificationStatus.

param.name: eCallConfirmationStatus
param.description: References signal "eCallConfirmation". See ECallConfirmationStatus.

param.name: voiceRecOn
param.description: References signal "CPM_VoiceRec_STAT".

param.name: btIconOn
param.description: References signal "BT_ICON".

param.name: callActive
param.description: References signal "CPM_Call_Active_STAT".

param.name: phoneRoaming
param.description: References signal "CPM_Phone_Roaming_STAT".

param.name: textMsgAvailable
param.description: References signal "CPM_TextMsg_AVAL".

param.name: battLevelStatus
param.description: Device battery level status. References signal "CPM_Batt_Level_STAT". See DeviceLevelStatus.

param.name: stereoAudioOutputMuted
param.description: References signal "CPM_Stereo_Audio_Output".

param.name: monoAudioOutputMuted
param.description: References signal "CPM_Mono_Audio_Output".

param.name: signalLevelStatus
param.description: Device signal level status. References signal "CPM_Signal_Strength_STAT". See DeviceLevelStatus.

param.name: primaryAudioSource
param.description: References signal "CPM_Stereo_PAS_Source". See PrimaryAudioSource.

param.name: eCallEventActive
param.description: References signal "eCall_Event".

param.name: parkBrakeActive
param.description: References signal "PrkBrkActv_B_Actl".

param.name: ignitionStableStatus
param.description: References signal "Ignition_Switch_Stable". See IgnitionStableStatus.

param.name: ignitionStatus
param.description: References signal "Ignition_status". See IgnitionStatus.

param.name: driverBeltDeployed
param.description: References signal "VedsDrvBelt_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: passengerBeltDeployed
param.description: References signal "VedsPasBelt_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: passengerBuckleBelted
param.description: References signal "VedsRw1PasBckl_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: driverBuckleBelted
param.description: References signal "VedsRw1DrvBckl_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: leftRow2BuckleBelted
param.description: References signal "VedsRw2lBckl_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: passengerChildDetected
param.description: References signal "VedsRw1PasChld_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: rightRow2BuckleBelted
param.description: References signal "VedsRw2rBckl_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: middleRow2BuckleBelted
param.description: References signal "VedsRw2mBckl_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: middleRow3BuckleBelted
param.description: References signal "VedsRw3mBckl_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: leftRow3BuckleBelted
param.description: References signal "VedsRw3lBckl_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: rightRow3BuckleBelted
param.description: References signal "VedsRw3rBckl_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: leftRearInflatableBelted
param.description: References signal "VedsRw2lRib_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: rightRearInflatableBelted
param.description: References signal "VedsRw2rRib_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: middleRow1BeltDeployed
param.description: References signal "VedsRw1mBelt_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

param.name: middleRow1BuckleBelted
param.description: References signal "VedsRw1mBckl_D_Ltchd". See VehicleDataEventStatus.

struct.name: TireStatus
struct.description: The status and pressure of the tires.

param.name: pressureTelltale
param.description: Status of the Tire Pressure Telltale. See WarningLightStatus.

param.name: leftFront
param.description: The status of the left front tire.

param.name: rightFront
param.description: The status of the right front tire.

param.name: leftRear
param.description: The status of the left rear tire.

param.name: rightRear
param.description: The status of the right rear tire.

param.name: innerLeftRear
param.description: The status of the inner left rear.

param.name: innerRightRear
param.description: The status of the inner right rear.

param.name: utcYear
param.description: The current UTC year.

param.name: utcMonth
param.description: The current UTC month.

param.name: utcDay
param.description: The current UTC day.

param.name: utcHours
param.description: The current UTC hour.

param.name: utcMinutes
param.description: The current UTC minute.

param.name: utcSeconds
param.description: The current UTC second.

param.name: compassDirection
param.description: See CompassDirection.

param.name: pdop
param.description: PDOP.

param.name: hdop
param.description: HDOP.

param.name: vdop
param.description: VDOP.

param.name: actual
param.description: True, if actual.
False, if infered.

param.name: satellites
param.description: Number of satellites in view

param.name: dimension
param.description: See Dimension

param.name: altitude
param.description: Altitude in meters

param.name: heading
param.description: The heading. North is 0. Resolution is 0.01

param.name: speed
param.description: The speed in KPH

param.name: identifier
param.description: String containing hexadecimal identifier as well as other common names.

param.name: statusByte
param.description: Hexadecimal byte string.

function.name: GetCapabilities
function.description: Method should be invoked at system startup. Provides information about all supported hardware buttons and their capabilites

param.name: capabilities
param.description: See ButtonCapabilities

param.name: presetBankCapabilities
param.description: If returned, the platform supports custom on-screen Presets

function.name: OnButtonEvent
function.description: Notifies application of UP/DOWN events for buttons

param.name: mode
param.description: Indicates whether this is an UP or DOWN event.

param.name: customButtonID
param.description: If ButtonName is “CUSTOM_BUTTON", this references the integer ID passed by a custom button. (e.g. softButtonName)

param.name: mode
param.description: Indicates whether this is a LONG or SHORT button press event.

param.name: customButtonID
param.description: If ButtonName is “CUSTOM_BUTTON", this references the string passed by a custom button. (e.g. softButtonName)

function.name: GetDeviceList
function.description: Request from HMI to SmartDeviceLink to get the list of devices

function.name: OnDeviceListUpdated
function.description: Notification from SmartDeviceLink to HMI about changes in device list.

function.name: GetAppList
function.description: This methos is usually invoked by HMI to get list of registered apps.

function.name: ActivateApp
function.description: Invoked by UI component when user clicks on app in the list of registered apps. Application is shown on recieving successful response.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of selected application.

function.name: OnAppDeactivated
function.description: Invoked by UI component when user switches to any functionality which is not other mobile application.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of deactivated application.

param.name: reason
param.description: Specifies the functionality user switched to.

function.name: OnAppRegistered
function.description: Issued by SDL to notify HMI about new application registered.

function.name: OnAppUnregistered
function.description: Issued by SDL to notify HMI about application unregistered. Application then to be removed from application list; all data connected with application has to be cleared up.

function.name: ExitApplication
function.description: Used by HMI when User chooses to exit application. Sent from HMI to SDL.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: ExitApplication
function.description: Success of operation.

function.name: ExitAllApplications
function.description: Sent by HMI to SDL to close all registered applications.

param.name: reason
param.description: Specifies reason for exiting all apllications.

function.name: MixingAudioSupported
function.description: Request from SDL to HMI to find out if the last one supports mixing audio (ie recording TTS command and playing audio).

function.name: MixingAudioSupported
function.description: If no response received SDL suggest that mixing audio is not supported

function.name: IsReady
function.description: Method should be invoked at system startup. Response provides information about presence of VR module and its readiness to cooperate with SDL.

param.name: availabe
param.description: If true then VR is present and ready to communicate with SDL.

function.name: Started
function.description: Initiated by VR module to let SDL know that VR session has started.

function.name: Stopped
function.description: Initiated by VR module to let SDL know that VR session has stopped.

function.name: AddCommand
function.description: Adds command(string with associated id) to VR.

param.name: cmdId
param.description: Id of command to used in OnCommand notification.

param.name: vrCommands
param.description: List of strings to be used as VR commands.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: DeleteCommand
function.description: Delete commands from VR

param.name: cmdId
param.description: Id of list of commands sent by AddCommand.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: OnCommand
function.description: Notifies SDL about command trigerred via VR

param.name: cmdID
param.description: Id of list of commands which trigerred command belongs to.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: ChangeRegistration
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to change language for app.

param.name: language
param.description: The language application wants to switch to.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: OnLanguageChange
function.description: Notification from HMI to SmartDeviceLink about change of language.

param.name: language
param.description: Language VR switched to.

function.name: GetSupportedLanguages
function.description: Method should be invoked at system startup. Response provides information about VR supported languages.

param.name: languages
param.description: List of languages supported in VR.

function.name: GetLanguage
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to get currently active VR language

interface.name: TTS
interface.description: RPC for communication between TTS and SDL.

function.name: IsReady
function.description: Method should be invoked at system startup. Response provides information about presence of TTS module and its readiness to cooperate with SDL.

param.name: availabe
param.description: If true then TTS is present and ready to communicate with SDL.

function.name: Speak
function.description: RPC from SDL to TTS to record text.

param.name: ttsChunks
param.description: List of strings to be recorded.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: Speak
function.description: Provides information about success of operation.

function.name: StopSpeaking
function.description: Initiated by SDL to stop recording text.

function.name: ChangeRegistration
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to change language for app.

param.name: language
param.description: The language application wants to switch to.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: OnLanguageChange
function.description: Notification from HMI to SmartDeviceLink about change of language.

param.name: language
param.description: Language TTS switched to.

function.name: GetSupportedLanguages
function.description: Method should be invoked at system startup. Response provides information about TTS supported languages.

param.name: languages
param.description: List of languages supported in TTS.

function.name: GetLanguage
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to get currently active TTS language

function.name: Alert
function.description: Shows an alert which typically consists of text-to-speech message and text on the display. At least either alertText1, alertText2 or TTSChunks need to be provided.

param.name: alertText1
param.description: The first line of the alert text field

param.name: alertText2
param.description: The second line of the alert text field

param.name: alertText3
param.description: The third line of the alert text field

param.name: ttsChunks
param.description: An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk

param.name: duration
param.description: Timeout in milliseconds. Typical timeouts are 3-5 seconds. If omitted, timeout is set to 5s.

param.name: playTone
param.description: Defines if tone should be played. Tone is played before TTS. If omitted, no tone is played.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: App defined SoftButtons

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application requested this RPC.

param.name: tryAgainTime
param.description: Amount of time (in seconds) that an app must wait before resending an alert.

param.name: mainField1
param.description: The text that should be displayed in a single or upper display line.
If this text is not set, the text of mainField1 stays unchanged.
If this text is empty "", the field will be cleared.

param.name: mainField2
param.description: The text that should be displayed on the second display line.
If this text is not set, the text of mainField2 stays unchanged.
If this text is empty "", the field will be cleared.

param.name: mainField3
param.description: The text that should be displayed on the second "page" first display line.
If this text is not set, the text of mainField3 stays unchanged.
If this text is empty "", the field will be cleared.

param.name: mainField4
param.description: The text that should be displayed on the second "page" second display line.
If this text is not set, the text of mainField4 stays unchanged.
If this text is empty "", the field will be cleared.

param.name: alignment
param.description: Specifies how mainField1 and mainField2 texts should be aligned on display.
If omitted, texts will be centered

param.name: statusBar
param.description: Requires investigation regarding the nav display capabilities. Potentially lower lowerStatusBar, upperStatusBar, titleBar, etc.

param.name: mediaClock
param.description: Text value for MediaClock field. Has to be properly formatted by Mobile App according to Sync capabilities.
If media clock was set previously resets it.

param.name: mediaTrack
param.description: The text that should be displayed in the track field.
This field is only valid for media applications on NGN type ACMs.
If this text is not set, the text of mediaTrack stays unchanged.
If this text is empty "", the field will be cleared.

param.name: graphic
param.description: Path to optional image. If omitted on supported displays, the displayed graphic shall not change.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: App defined SoftButtons.
If omitted on supported displays, the currently displayed SoftButton values will not change.

param.name: customPresets
param.description: App labeled on-screen presets (i.e. GEN2).
If omitted on supported displays, the presets will be shown as not defined.

function.name: AddCommand
function.description: Adds a command to the application menu.

param.name: cmdID
param.description: ID of the command to add.

param.name: menuParams
param.description: Optional sub value containing menu parameters

param.name: cmdIcon
param.description: Image struct determining whether static or dynamic icon.
If omitted on supported displays, no (or the default if applicable) icon shall be displayed.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: DeleteCommand
function.description: Deletes command from the in-application menu with the specified command id.

param.name: cmdId
param.description: cmdId sent via AddCommand request - id of command to be deleted.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: AddSubMenu
function.description: Adds a sub menu to the in-application menu.

param.name: menuID
param.description: ID of the sub menu to add. Unique for the application.

param.name: position
param.description: Position within the items that are are at top level of the in application menu.
0 will insert at the front.
1 will insert at the second position.
If position is greater or equal than the number of items on top level, the sub menu will be appended to the end.
Position of any submenu will always be located before the return and exit options
If this param was omitted the entry will be added at the end.

param.name: menuName
param.description: Text to show in the menu for this sub menu.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: DeleteSubMenu
function.description: Deletes a submenu from the in-application menu.

param.name: menuID
param.description: The "menuID" of the submenu to delete. (See addSubMenu.menuID)

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: CreateInteractionChoiceSet
function.description: Creates interaction choice set to be used later by performInteraction

param.name: interactionChoiceSetID
param.description: Unique ID used for this interaction choice set.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: DeleteInteractionChoiceSet
function.description: Deletes interaction choice set that has been created with "CreateInteractionChoiceSet".
The interaction may only be deleted when not currently in use by a "performInteraction".

param.name: interactionChoiceSetID
param.description: ID of the interaction choice set to delete.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: PerformInteraction
function.description: Triggers an interaction (e.g. "Permit GPS?" - Yes, no, Always Allow).

param.name: initialText
param.description: Text to be displayed first.

param.name: interactionChoiceSetIDList
param.description: List of interaction choice set IDs to use with an interaction.

param.name: timeout
param.description: Timeout in milliseconds.
If omitted a standard value of 10000 milliseconds is used.

param.name: vrHelp
param.description: Ability to send suggested VR Help Items to display on-screen during Perform Interaction.
If omitted on supported displays, the default SYNC generated list of suggested choices shall be displayed.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

param.name: choiceID
param.description: ID of the choice that was selected in response to PerformInteraction.

function.name: SetMediaClockTimer
function.description: Sets the initial media clock value and automatic update method.

param.name: startTime
param.description: startTime must be provided for "COUNTUP" and "COUNTDOWN"
startTime will be ignored for "PAUSE", "RESUME", and "CLEAR"

param.name: updateMode
param.description: Enumeration to control the media clock.
In case of pause, resume, or clear, the start time value is ignored and shall be left out. For resume, the time continues with the same value as it was when paused.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: SetGlobalProperties
function.description: Sets some properties for the application initiated request.

param.name: vrHelpTitle
param.description: VR Help Title text.
If omitted on supported displays, the default SYNC help title shall be used.

param.name: vrHelp
param.description: If omitted on supported displays, the default SYNC generated help items shall be used.
If the list of VR Help Items contains nonsequential positions (e.g. [1,2,4]), the RPC shall be rejected.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: OnCommand
function.description: Notification is initiated by HMI on user choosing menu item.

param.name: cmdID
param.description: Command ID, which is related to a specific menu entry.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: OnSystemContext
function.description: Notification initiated by HMI when user changes context: goes to menu (in-application menu or system menu); switches to VR; pop-up appears on screen etc.

function.name: GetCapabilities
function.description: Method is invoked at system startup by SDL to request information about UI capabilities of HMI.

param.name: softButtonCapabilities
param.description: If returned, the platform supports on-screen SoftButtons.

function.name: ChangeRegistration
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to change language for app.

param.name: language
param.description: The language application wants to switch to.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: OnLanguageChange
function.description: Notification from HMI to SmartDeviceLink about change of language.

param.name: language
param.description: Language UI switched to.

function.name: GetSupportedLanguages
function.description: Method should be invoked at system startup. Response provides information about UI supported languages.

param.name: languages
param.description: List of languages supported in UI.

function.name: GetLanguage
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLink to HMI to get currently active UI language

function.name: OnDriverDistraction
function.description: Notification is sent from HMI to SDL when interaction with head unit can badly reflect on drivers attention.

function.name: SetAppIcon
function.description: Used to set existing local file on SYNC as the app's icon.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: OnDeviceChosen
function.description: Notification is initiated by HMI on user selecting device in list of devices.

function.name: Slider
function.description: Creates a full screen or pop-up overlay (depending on platform) with a single user controlled slider.

param.name: numTicks
param.description: Number of selectable items on a horizontal axis

param.name: position
param.description: Initial position of slider control (cannot exceed numTicks)

param.name: sliderHeader
param.description: Text header to display

param.name: sliderFooter
param.description: Text footer to display (meant to display min/max threshold descriptors).
For a static text footer, only one footer string shall be provided in the array.
For a dynamic text footer, the number of footer text string in the array must match the numTicks value.
For a dynamic text footer, text array string should correlate with potential slider position index.
If omitted on supported displays, no footer text shall be displayed.

param.name: timeout
param.description: App defined timeout.
If omitted, the value is set to 10000.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

param.name: sliderPosition
param.description: Current slider value returned when saved or canceled (aborted)
This value is only returned for resultCodes "SAVED" or "ABORTED"

function.name: ScrollableMessage
function.description: Creates a full screen overlay containing a large block of formatted text that can be scrolled with up to 8 SoftButtons defined

param.name: scrollableMessageBody
param.description: Body of text that can include newlines and tabs.

param.name: timeout
param.description: App defined timeout.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: App defined SoftButtons.
If omitted on supported displays, only the system defined "Close" SoftButton will be displayed.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

param.name: audioPassThruDisplayText1
param.description: First line of text displayed during audio capture.

param.name: audioPassThruDisplayText2
param.description: Second line of text displayed during audio capture.

param.name: maxDuration
param.description: The maximum duration of audio recording in milliseconds.

function.name: EndAudioPassThru
function.description: When this request is invoked, the audio capture stops.

function.name: ShowConstantTBT
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLinkCore to HMI to show info about navigation.

param.name: distanceToManeuver
param.description: Distance till next maneuver (starting from) from previous maneuver.
Used to calculate progress bar.

param.name: distanceToManeuverScale
param.description: Fraction of distance till next maneuver (starting from when AlertManeuver is triggered).
Used to calculate progress bar.

param.name: maneuverComplete
param.description: If and when a maneuver has completed while an AlertManeuver is active, the app must send this value set to TRUE in order to clear the AlertManeuver overlay.
If omitted the value will be assumed as FALSE.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: Three dynamic SoftButtons available (second SoftButton is fixed to "Turns").
If omitted on supported displays, the currently displayed SoftButton values will not change.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

function.name: AlertManeuver
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLinkCore to HMI to announce navigation maneuver

param.name: softButtons
param.description: If omitted on supported displays, only the system defined "Close" SoftButton shall be displayed.

function.name: UpdateTurnList
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLinkCore to HMI to update turn list.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: If omitted on supported displays, app-defined SoftButton will be left blank.

function.name: OnTBTClientState
function.description: Provides applications with notifications specific to the current TBT client status on the module

param.name: state
param.description: Current State of TBT client

function.name: OnReady
function.description: HMI notifies SDL about its readiness to start communication. In fact, this has to be the first message between SDL and HMI.

function.name: ClosePopUp
function.description: Initiated by SDL to close currently active pop-up on HMI.

function.name: ClosePopUp
function.description: Provides result of operation.

function.name: GetVehicleType
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLinkCore to HMI to get info about the vehicle.

function.name: GetVehicleData
function.description: Request from SmartDeviceLinkCore to HMI for non periodic vehicle data.

param.name: gps
param.description: See GPSData
Subscribable

param.name: speed
param.description: The vehicle speed in kilometers per hour
Subscribable

param.name: rpm
param.description: The number of revolutions per minute of the engine
Subscribable

param.name: fuelLevel
param.description: The fuel level in the tank (percentage)

param.name: fuelLevel_State
param.description: The fuel level state

param.name: instantFuelConsumption
param.description: The instantaneous fuel consumption in microlitres

param.name: externalTemperature
param.description: The external temperature in degrees celsius.

param.name: vin
param.description: Vehicle identification number.

param.name: prndl
param.description: See PRNDL.
Subscribable

param.name: tirePressure
param.description: See TireStatus.
Subscribable

param.name: odometer
param.description: Odometer in km

param.name: beltStatus
param.description: The status of the seat belts.

param.name: bodyInformation
param.description: The body information including ignition status and internal temp.

param.name: deviceStatus
param.description: The device status including signal and battery strength.

param.name: eCallInfo
param.description: Emergency Call notification and confirmation data.

param.name: airbagStatus
param.description: The status of the air bags.

param.name: emergencyEvent
param.description: Information related to an emergency event (and if it occurred).

param.name: clusterModeStatus
param.description: The status modes of the cluster.

param.name: myKey
param.description: Information related to the MyKey feature.

param.name: driverBraking
param.description: The status of the brake pedal.

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: gps
param.description: See GPSData
Subscribable

param.name: speed
param.description: The vehicle speed in kilometers per hour
Subscribable

param.name: rpm
param.description: The number of revolutions per minute of the engine
Subscribable

param.name: fuelLevel
param.description: The fuel level in the tank (percentage)

param.name: fuelLevel_State
param.description: The fuel level state

param.name: instantFuelConsumption
param.description: The instantaneous fuel consumption in microlitres

param.name: externalTemperature
param.description: The external temperature in degrees celsius.

param.name: vin
param.description: Vehicle identification number.

param.name: prndl
param.description: See PRNDL.
Subscribable
param.issue: Is this a good name? Wouldn't be selectedGear better?

param.name: tirePressure
param.description: See TireStatus.
Subscribable

param.name: odometer
param.description: Odometer in km

param.name: beltStatus
param.description: The status of the seat belts.

param.name: bodyInformation
param.description: The body information including power modes.

param.name: deviceStatus
param.description: The device status including signal and battery strength.

param.name: eCallInfo
param.description: Emergency Call notification and confirmation data.

param.name: airbagStatus
param.description: The status of the air bags.

param.name: emergencyEvent
param.description: Information related to an emergency event (and if it occurred).

param.name: clusterModeStatus
param.description: The status modes of the cluster.

param.name: myKey
param.description: Information related to the MyKey feature.

param.name: driverBraking
param.description: The status of the brake pedal.

Subscribable

param.name: speed
param.description: The vehicle speed in kilometers per hour
Subscribable

param.name: rpm

param.name: fuelLevel

param.name: externalTemperature

param.name: beltStatus

param.name: deviceStatus

function.name: ReadDID
function.description: Non periodic vehicle data read request.

param.name: ecuName
param.description: Name of ECU.

param.name: didLocation
param.description: Get raw data from vehicle data DID location(s).

param.name: didLength
param.description: Length of raw data from vehicle data DID location(s).

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

param.name: dataResult
param.description: Permission status of data element.

param.name: data
param.description: Raw DID-based data returned for requested element.

function.name: GetDTCs
function.description: Vehicle module diagnostic trouble code request.

param.name: ecuName
param.description: Name of ECU.

param.name: appId
param.description: Id of application that requested this RPC.

param.name: dtcList
param.description: Array of all reported DTCs on module.
